TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SecurityTokenElement extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a number elements found in a which represent security tokens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is not thread-safe.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken securityToken) cil managed

Docs.param: The security token that the new instance represents.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using a object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When this constructor is used, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement.GetIdentities%2A> method is not supported by the new instance unless the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement.CreateSubject%2A> method is overridden.
If the `securityToken` parameter is an instance of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityToken> then the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement.SecurityTokenXml%2A> property is set to the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityToken.TokenXml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.XmlElement securityTokenXml, class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection securityTokenHandlers) cil managed

Docs.param: The XML representation of the security token.
The default token handler collection that is used to read and validate the security token wrapped by the new instance.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified XML representation of a security token.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> GetIdentities() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the identities that are contained in the wrapped token.
Docs.returns: The identities that are contained in the token.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken GetSecurityToken() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the security token that is represented by the current instance.
Docs.returns: The security token that the current instance represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the current instance was not constructed explicitly from a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> object by using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor, then the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement.ReadSecurityToken%2A> method is called to return the security token.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken ReadSecurityToken (System.Xml.XmlElement securityTokenXml, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection securityTokenHandlers);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken ReadSecurityToken(class System.Xml.XmlElement securityTokenXml, class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection securityTokenHandlers) cil managed

Docs.param: The XML representation of the security token.
The token handler collection to use to read the token.
Docs.summary: Deserializes a from the specified XML representation.
Docs.returns: The security token that was deserialized from the XML.

Docs.summary: Gets the XML representation of the wrapped token.
Docs.value: The XML representation of the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is `null` unless the current instance was initialized by using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenElement.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlElement%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor.

Docs.param: The XML representation of the security token.
The token handler collection to use to read the token.
Docs.summary: Creates the identities that are contained in the specified XML representation of a security token.
Docs.returns: The identities that are contained in the token.
